item.scguns.pistol_ammo_box.description: Stores Compact Copper/Advanced rounds, Hog Rounds and Standard/Hardened Bullets
item.scguns.rifle_ammo_box.description: Stores Standard Copper Rounds, Advanced Rounds, Gibbs Rounds, Krahg Rounds and Shatter Rounds
item.scguns.shotgun_ammo_box.description: Stores Shotgun Shells, Bearpack Shells, Shulkshot, Buckshot, Nitro Buckshot and Shatter Rounds
item.scguns.magnum_ammo_box.description: Stores Ramrod Rounds, Beowulf Rounds and Hog Rounds
item.scguns.energy_ammo_box.description: Stores Energy/Shock/Sculk Cells, Blaze Fuel and Energy Cores
item.scguns.special_ammo_box.description: Stores Powder and Ball, Grapeshot, Shotball, Blaze Rods, Arrows and Healing Darts
item.scguns.empty_casing_pouch.descripti: Collects empty bullet casings for recycling
item.scguns.creative_ammo_box.descriptio: Creative box with unlimited ammunition access
tooltip.scguns.upgrade.name: Upgrade Name
tooltip.scguns.upgrade.install_hint: Can be installed in ExoSuit armor
scguns.desc.flintlock_pistol: One of the  first successful firearms design using, at the time named, Creeper Dust. Cobblestone construction speaks to the humble beginnings of firearms.
scguns.desc.handcannon: The coach gun for the frontier. Short, portable, and devastating at close range. Perfect for protecting wagon trains from hostile encounters.
scguns.desc.musket: The weapon that widened the frontier. Accurate enough for hunting, reliable enough for survival in the wilderness.
scguns.desc.blunderbuss: An early long barrel Shotgun, The preferred weapon of frontier trading post guards.
scguns.desc.doublet: When one barrel wasn't enough. Twin barrels meant the difference between dinner and becoming it.
scguns.desc.repeating_musket: A gunsmith's attempt to solve the musket's slow reload. The crank mechanism was ingenious, if temperamental.
scguns.desc.fencer_carabine: A lever action musket designed by Fencer & Sons. With a internal magazine built into its stock, it was a favorite among frontiersmen.
scguns.desc.fencer_thumper: A revolving pump action blunderbuss conversion, this prototype paved the path for future shotgun technology.
scguns.desc.longarm: An early revolver design, the Longarm was a favorite among lawmen and outlaws alike. Its balance of power and portability made it a versatile sidearm.
scguns.desc.pax: The revolver that tamed the frontier. Reliable, versatile, and deadly in the right hands.
scguns.desc.winnie: Compact lever action perfection. Fast enough for quick fire, accurate enough for precision work.
scguns.desc.winnie_millend: Chambered in a higher caliber for big game hunting. The extended barrel improved accuracy at longer ranges.
scguns.desc.callwell: The shotgun that defined a generation of hunters. Fast, reliable, and deadly at close range.
scguns.desc.callwell_terminal: Extended barrel for serious hunting work. The drum magazine meant never running dry during dangerous hunts.
scguns.desc.callwell_conversion: Cut down for portability without sacrificing the Callwell Co.'s legendary reliability.
scguns.desc.saketini: The twist barrel mechanism allowed for quick reloads. Precision marksmanship demanded both accuracy and speed.
scguns.desc.saketini_ironport: Fitted with a Alon's Repeater Magazine for increased capacity. An attempt at modernizing the Saketini.
scguns.desc.laser_musket: Where traditional gunpowder met early energy technology. A fusion of familiar design with mysterious power.
scguns.desc.plasmabuss: Plasma technology crammed into a blunderbuss frame. The result was devastating, if unpredictable.
scguns.desc.big_bore: It remains unclear why pioneers felt compelled to build something this massive, or what threat could have justified such devastating power.
scguns.desc.scrapper: Cobbled from salvaged Federal parts and copper tubing. The side fed stripper clip was the Collective's answer to limited manufacturing.
scguns.desc.rusty_gnat: A crude attempt to copy Asgharian submachine guns. Poor materials and limited machining made these unreliable at best.
scguns.desc.umax_pistol: Rust Ridge's solution to ammunition scarcity, an air powered pistol that fires bullets without the need for precious gunpowder.
scguns.desc.makeshift_rifle: The RRC's most consistent design, a serviceable copy of the Federal M3. Clunky, but it kept settlements alive.
scguns.desc.boomstick: As the dead continued to rise, Rust Ridge had to go for power. Twin reciprocating barrels built for the swarms that followed.
scguns.desc.bruiser: Heavy copper construction makes every shot feel like a sledgehammer. The Collective's idea of 'stopping power.'
scguns.desc.llr_director: The monument of Rust Ridge craftsmanship, a reliable pump action rifle that almost rivals prewar quality. Almost.
scguns.desc.birdfeeder: Stripper clip fed LMG, built off the frame of an LLR Director. The Collective's last ditch effort to hold back the dead.
scguns.desc.arc_worker: A repurposed welding tool turned weapon of last resort. Exposed wiring crackles with dangerous voltage.
scguns.desc.floundergat: A ceremonial shotgun presented to veteran harpooners. Gold inlays commemorate decades served aboard the Leviathan Syndicate's floating cities.
scguns.desc.marlin: Standard issue for the Syndicate's elite 'Depth Marines.' Cyan heartwood stock, waterproofed action, and deadly precision beneath the waves.
scguns.desc.sequoia: The Syndicate's answer to ship armor and leviathan hide. This massive revolver could punch through steel plating at two hundred yards.
scguns.desc.bomb_lance: Traditional whaling spear evolved into ship killer. The explosive tip could breach a hull or finish a wounded giant with equal efficiency.
scguns.desc.hullbreaker: A hastily improvised deck cannon, cobbled together as the Syndicate's floating cities came under siege.
scguns.desc.defender_pistol: The Federal Armaments Consortium's standard issue sidearm. Mass produced reliability that armed security forces across three continents.
scguns.desc.trenchur: Brutal close quarters design with integrated knuckle dusters. Federal's corporate enforcers demanded their intimidation tools.
scguns.desc.greaser_smg: Assembly line manufacturing at its peak. Simple, reliable design that equipped Federal armies faster than any competitor could match.
scguns.desc.m3_carabine: The weapon that secured Federal's global dominance. Sturdy, versatile, and endlessly mass producible. Industrial warfare perfected.
scguns.desc.m3_marksman: Precision variant built off the standard M3 platform. Firing an experimental round created from a taciturn R&D group
scguns.desc.combat_shotgun: The riot suppression standard across occupied territories. Brutal effectiveness at maintaining corporate order in industrial districts.
scguns.desc.venturi: Less lethal variant developed as unrest spread through controlled territories. Air pressure rounds subdued crowds without creating martyrs.
scguns.desc.iron_javelin: Precision manufacturing meets long range requirements. The Federal sniper's tool of choice during border conflicts.
scguns.desc.iron_spear: Heavy caliber conversion of the Javelin platform. When military forces needed to punch through fortified positions.
scguns.desc.auvtomag: Emergency development as strange reports of paranormal events emerged from contested regions. Federal R&D's hasty answer to unprecedented threats.
scguns.desc.pulsar: Corporate crowd control for FAC facilities. Four non lethal shots to maintain productivity without permanent workforce damage.
scguns.desc.gyrojet_pistol: Experimental Federal R&D project from their height of power. Micro rockets proved innovative but impractically expensive.
scguns.desc.brawler: Close protection weapon for FAC executives. Devastating stopping power in an easily concealed package.
scguns.desc.crusader: Federal medical corps standard during expansion wars. Healing dart deployment kept valuable soldiers operational longer.
scguns.desc.mk43_rifle: Special forces variant of the Gyrojet platform. Expense limited deployment to Federal black ops units only.
scguns.desc.rocket_rifle: An R&D prototype from before the resource shortages. Early experiments in portable infantry rocket systems.
scguns.desc.ultra_knight_hawk: A silver plated monument to corporate excess. Custom built for the Consortium CEO who demanded the biggest gun money could buy.
scguns.desc.m22_waltz: Standard COG sidearm after the Federal split. Designed for exosuit integration, Without mechanical arm support, Ramrod recoil is punishing.
scguns.desc.waltz_conversion: Laser retrofit using adapted Asgharian energy technology. COG engineering adapted the alien power sources to familiar platforms.
scguns.desc.osgood_50: Dr. Osgood's early post Federal masterpiece. The massive revolver established COG's new doctrine of overwhelming mechanical force.
scguns.desc.grandle_og: A low caliber sporting rifle. Given to COG youth to teach marksmanship and responsibility with firearms. Its iconic ping during reload became a cultural touchstone.
scguns.desc.grandle: Desperate wartime conversion of a sporting rifle. Wood furnishings and full auto fire marked COG's dwindling resources near war's end.
scguns.desc.cogloader: The backbone of COG infantry. Pan fed reliability and devastating accuracy made this the empire's standard battle rifle.
scguns.desc.gale: Steam powered precision when the oil reserves dwindled. Industrial machinery channeled into each metal projectile with devastating kinetic force.
scguns.desc.jackhammer: The Consortium of Operational Governance's bunker clearing solution. This automatic shotguns blasts would open any door the empire needed opening.
scguns.desc.howler: The sound of this rifle became synonymous with COG dominance. Each Krahg round carried the empire's industrial might.
scguns.desc.howler_conversion: Full auto conversion requiring complete exosuit integration for handling. COG's mechanical answer to Asgharian enhanced soldiers.
scguns.desc.gauss_rifle: Electromagnetic precision firing plasma rounds. Adapted Asgharian laser tech improved with electrified redstone innovation.
scguns.desc.niami: An oddly elegant crossbow among COG's brutal arsenal. Even industrial empires needed refined engineering projects.
scguns.desc.spitfire: Twin tank system channeling concentrated blaze fuel. The nether's fury harnessed for COG's scorched earth tactics.
scguns.desc.gattaler: Four rotating barrels embodying pure COG doctrine. When overwhelming firepower wasn't enough, more barrels solved everything.
scguns.desc.thunderhead: Heavy Gattaler conversion with dual reciprocating barrels. The standard for COG Heavy weapon units.
scguns.desc.scratches: Shoulder mounted steam powered shotgun array. R&D engineering applied compressed air to close quarters devastation. An Industrial R&D early prototype.
scguns.desc.cr4k_mining_laser: Standard COG mining equipment. Continuous redstone powered beam designed for precision excavation work.
scguns.desc.dozier_rl: Dr. Osgood's four barrel rocket system. When conventional overkill required even more overwhelming force.
scguns.desc.krauser: Standard Asgharian sidearm after the Federal schism. Modular design adapted to varied physiologies as soul enhanced genetic modification became widespread.
scguns.desc.soul_drummer: Rapid fire conversion with supernatural recoil forces. Only genetically enhanced soldiers could control its violent cycling rate.
scguns.desc.uppercut: Heavy Krauser variant for elimination duties. Genetic engineers used these to terminate failed experimental subjects.
scguns.desc.micina: Stylish double action revolver. The rapid burst fire requires the skillful handling of a professional
scguns.desc.valora: Integrated silencer and automatic fire made this the weapon of choice for Asgharian shadow operations.
scguns.desc.prush_gun: Standard submachine gun optimized for enhanced soldier physiology. Quick handling suited their unnatural height and proportions.
scguns.desc.lockewood: Three-round burst system with rapid cycling speed. The burst of gunfire splitting the air became a trademark of Asgharian infantry.
scguns.desc.rg_jigsaw: Firing the experimental Shatter Round, this bullpup DMR was primarily used in ambush tactics.
scguns.desc.inertial: Inertia powered loading using soul energy manipulation. Each shot built momentum through forbidden power sources that COG refused to embrace.
scguns.desc.mas_55: Long range precision weapon for Asgharian marksmen. Modified vision and steadied breathing made impossible shots routine.
scguns.desc.plasgun: Asgharian refinement of adapted COG plasma technology. Diamond steel construction contained energies beyond original specifications.
scguns.desc.cyclone: Heavy microjet launcher requiring enhanced soldier strength. Normal humans couldn't manage the weapon's supernatural weight.
scguns.desc.shard_culler: Perfect amethyst shard weaponizing the research that would birth the Soul Splitter. Arcane focusing systems channel energy toward ultimate devastation.
scguns.desc.mokova: Compact sidearm with integrated suppressor. Wrecker engineers prioritized stealth over stopping power against rogue automatons.
scguns.desc.mak_mkii: Rapid-fire submachine gun for close-quarters combat. When facing haywire COG units, volume of fire compensates for reduced caliber.
scguns.desc.turnpike: Heavy bolt action cobbled from prewar components. Wrecker snipers make do with whatever rifle parts survive the wasteland.
scguns.desc.stiletto: A one handed Turnpike conversion, chambered in the heavy Krahg round, cut down and modified for portability.
scguns.desc.killer_23: Pump action shotgun with tightened spread pattern. Precision became essential against heavily armored mechanical targets.
scguns.desc.homemaker: Lever Action Conversion of the Killer 23. Chambered in Shatter Rounds with a fitted splitter barrel for increased pellet count.
scguns.desc.kalaskah: Bullpup burst rifle built for ammunition conservation. Three round bursts maintain effectiveness while preserving precious rounds.
scguns.desc.basker: Extended barrel flamethrower for clearing COG nests. Fire burns through armor when conventional weapons fail.
scguns.desc.tl_runner: Break-action revolver retrofitted with plasma core technology. Wrecker ingenuity applied to pre Soul Splitter energy systems.
scguns.desc.stigg: Heavy assault rifle with high capacity magazine. Wrecker engineers prioritized sustained fire against relentless mechanical foes.
scguns.desc.empty_blasphemy: Ancient builder knowledge twisted into Piglin craftsmanship. The arm mounted frame awaits a captured blaze to complete its unholy purpose.
scguns.desc.pyroclastic_flow: Pocket sniper firing superheated projectiles. Nether metallurgy learned to channel volcanic fury into precision strikes.
scguns.desc.freyr: Side fed submachine gun with fiery core design. Once standard Piglin armament, now carried only by the diminished Hornlin.
scguns.desc.mangalitsa: Heavy shotgun that fragments gold tipped rounds into molten slag. Useful for hunting both beast and the armies of the Wither.
scguns.desc.vulcanic_repeater: Bulky automatic rifle firing heavy shots. The recoil punishes shooters, but hog strength handles what others cannot.
scguns.desc.trotters: Long barrel bolt action rifle fires Hog Rounds with handling not seen in most Piglin design.
scguns.desc.whispers: Sculk tendrils pulse with each shot, muffling sound through organic resonance. The weapon murmurs secrets only the corrupted can hear.
scguns.desc.echoes_2: Four barrels wrapped in pale sculk flesh channel sound waves into devastating force. Each shot reverberates through the soul.
scguns.desc.sculk_resonator: Living metal fused with sculk cores builds sonic energy before release. The charging hum grows louder as power accumulates.
scguns.desc.forlorn_hope: Bolt action precision grown from sculk corruption. The rifle's organic components self repair through absorbed vibrations and despair.
scguns.desc.carapice: A living Shulker serves as magazine, feeding homing projectiles through symbiotic bond. The creature seems content in its weaponized role.
scguns.desc.shellurker: Extended integration with defensive carapace plating. Twin projectiles spread from the living ammunition source within.
scguns.desc.weevil: Heavy Shulker weapon fusion with reciprocating barrel system. Three round bursts emerge from the creature's natural projectile generation.
scguns.desc.dark_matter: Purple wood conceals impossible ammunition storage within helical magazine. The capacity defies physical space through unknown means.
scguns.desc.lone_wonder: Crackling energy arcs between targets in devastating chains. The weapon's origin remains as mysterious as its devastating electrical fury.
scguns.desc.raygun: Retro futuristic design belies unknown technological sophistication.
scguns.desc.prima_materia: Your first reward for completing the ballistic curriculum. Deceptively simple design conceals otherworldly engineering standards.
scguns.desc.rat_king_and_queen: Dual pistols bound by love and madness. The Ordinate Collective's lesson in symbiotic violence, two became one through shared suffering.
scguns.desc.locust: Rapid bursts that devour everything in their path. The Collective teaches that hunger is the purest form of warfare.
scguns.desc.newborn_cyst: Break action design for maximum impact delivery. The birth of something so terrible requires an appropriate ceremonial armament.
scguns.desc.earths_corpse: Drum fed machine gun weeping for a world that died screaming. The suited entities nod approvingly at your planet's funeral dirge.
scguns.desc.flayed_god: Continuous laser beam channeled through captured wither essence. The Collective's boardroom echoes with approval as divinity suffers for your arsenal.
scguns.desc.nervepinch: Railgun firing shattering blaze rods before conscious thought completes.  Each impact erupts in flames that burn through steel and soul alike.
scguns.desc.terra_incognita: Four barrel rocket launcher for exploring uncharted destruction. 'Consider it our investment in your continued education.'
scguns.desc.astella: Anti-materiel rifle erasing targets from existence itself. The Collective's final examination requires perfect scores written in vaporized matter.
scguns.desc.exo_suit_helmet: Modular helmet frame designed to integrate with ExoSuit systems. Provides basic protection and a platform for advanced upgrades.
scguns.desc.exo_suit_chestplate: Reinforced chestplate frame designed to integrate with ExoSuit systems. Provides plating slots, power core housing, and a platform for advanced upgrades.
scguns.desc.exo_suit_leggings: Durable leggings frame designed to integrate with ExoSuit systems. Provides plating slots and a utility slot.
scguns.desc.exo_suit_boots: Sturdy boots frame designed to integrate with ExoSuit systems. Provides plating slots and a mobility enhancement slot.
item.scguns.depleted_diamond_steel_ingot: §7Right Click to convert to Diamond Steel
screen.scguns.blueprint.title: Blueprint
tooltip.scguns.arcing: Arcs Between Enemies and Can Disable Turrets
scguns.jei.info.wrecker_blueprint: Can be purchased from a strange merchant
scguns.jei.info.treated_brass_blueprint: Can be obtained from Wandering Traders, Osgood Dungeons, or Bastions
scguns.jei.info.diamond_steel_blueprint: Can be obtained from Wandering Traders,Asgharian Dungeons or Ancient Cities
info.scguns.fallback: Use this item in a crafting grid!
info.scguns.fallback_help: This is due to refactoring of items, sorry!
info.scguns.fallback_info: Item will be removed next update!
info.scguns.tooltip_item.repair_kit: Can repair guns if used on an anvil
enchantment.scguns.corroded.desc: Increases damage against Automaton enemies, can cause poison for non-automaton enemies
enchantment.scguns.gun_rust.desc: Causes the gun to jam frequently
enchantment.scguns.quick_hands.desc: Increases the speed of reloading weapons
enchantment.scguns.trigger_finger.desc: Increases the speed you can fire weapons
enchantment.scguns.lightweight.desc: Increases movement speed while holding a gun, and during reload speed loss is reduced. Heavy Weapons no longer slow you down
enchantment.scguns.collateral.desc: Makes fired bullets travel through multiple entities
enchantment.scguns.reclaimed.desc: Creates a chance that a bullet won't be consumed upon firing a weapon
enchantment.scguns.accelerator.desc: Increases base damage and speed, at the cost of increased durability loss
enchantment.scguns.puncturing.desc: Increases chance of critical hits, improves armor penetration but decreases base damage
enchantment.scguns.shell_catcher.desc: Increases the amount of spent shells retrieved when firing.
enchantment.scguns.banzai.desc: Increases damage multiplier based off speed during Banzai.
enchantment.scguns.heavy_shot.desc: Increases damage, But lowers fire rate and shot speed.
enchantment.scguns.hot_barrel.desc: Firing fills a draining bar, the bars level increases damage and fire rate, and heavily increases recoil and weapon spread.
enchantment.scguns.elemental_pop.desc: Fired bullets will have a chance to inflict a variety of status effects
enchantment.scguns.waterproof.desc: Reduces the damage to weapons when firing underwater and increases damage underwater
perk.scguns.title: Perks:
scguns.category.workbench.title: Assembling
scguns.jei.info.repair_kit: Can be used to repair guns on an anvil
scguns.jei.info.copper_blueprint: Can be obtained from Gunsmith Villagers
scguns.jei.info.iron_blueprint: Can be obtained from Gunsmith Villagers or Dungeons
scguns.jei.info.piglin_blueprint: Can be obtained from Nether Bastions
scguns.jei.info.ocean_blueprint: Can be obtained from Buried Treasure
scguns.jei.info.deep_dark_blueprint: Can be obtained from Ancient Cities
scguns.jei.info.end_blueprint: Can be obtained from End Cities
scguns.jei.info.niter_glass: Power with Redstone to change transparency
scguns.jei.info.vent_collector: Place on top of a Geothermal Vent to collect Niter, or on a Sulfuric Vent to obtain Sulfur. Accepts Wool and Composite filters as filter items.
scguns.jei.info.lightning_battery: Can be used to store energy, and obtain plasma or shock cells. Can be charged with FE power, or by placing a lightning rod, on top, and striking with lightning
scguns.jei.info.lightning_rod_connector: Can be used to transfer the charged state of a lightning rod to a lightning battery
scguns.jei.info.pistol_ammo_box: Can store Compact Copper Rounds, Compact Advanced Rounds, and Hog Rounds
scguns.jei.info.rifle_ammo_box: Can store Standard Copper Rounds, Advanced Rounds, Gibbs Rounds, and Krahg Rounds
scguns.jei.info.shotgun_ammo_box: Can store Shotgun Shells, Shulkshot and Bearpack Shells
scguns.jei.info.magnum_ammo_box: Can store Ramrod Rounds and Beowulf Rounds
scguns.jei.info.energy_ammo_box: Can store Energy Cells, Sculk Cells, Shock Cells and Blaze Fuel
scguns.jei.info.special_ammo_box: Can store Powder and Ball and Grapeshot
scguns.jei.info.empty_casing_pouch: Can be used to store casing and will catch spent casings
scguns.jei.info.rock_pouch: Can be used to store rocks
scguns.jei.info.dishes_pouch: Can be used to store your dirty dishes
scguns.jei.info.aureous_slag: Obtained from Hornlins consuming Gold items
scguns.jei.info.creative_ammo_box: Gives infinite ammo for all guns
scguns.jei.info.cryoniter: Inserting Niter/Cold items will freeze surrounding Water blocks
scguns.jei.info.thermolith: Inserting Vehement Coal/Extremely hot fuel items will melt surrounding rock to lava
scguns.jei.info.penetrator: A shaped charge, will explode a 3x3 tunnel in the direction its facing
scguns.jei.info.basic_turret: Must be powered via redstone, and have a Targeting module connected. Accepts Standard Copper Rounds, Advanced Rounds and Gibbs Rounds.
scguns.jei.info.auto_turret: Must be powered via redstone, and have a Targeting module connected. Accepts Compact Copper Rounds, Compact Advanced Rounds and Hog Rounds.
scguns.jei.info.shotgun_turret: Must be powered via redstone, and have a Targeting module connected. Accepts Shotgun Shells and Bearpack Shells.
scguns.jei.info.hostile_turret_targeting: Must be connected to a turret. Will target hostile mobs within range
scguns.jei.info.player_turret_targeting_: Must be connected to a turret. Will target non-owner Players within range
scguns.jei.info.turret_targeting_block: Must be connected to a turret. Will target all non-owner mobs within range
scguns.jei.info.fire_rate_turret_module: Must be connected to a turret. Will increase the fire rate of the turret
scguns.jei.info.damage_turret_module: Must be connected to a turret. Will increase the damage of the turret
scguns.jei.info.ammo_turret_module: Must be connected to a turret. Acts as a hopper will supply turrets inventory
scguns.jei.info.range_turret_module: Must be connected to a turret. Will increase the range of the turret
scguns.jei.info.shell_catcher_turret_mod: Must be connected to a turret. Will increase the chance of retrieving spent casings to 100%
scguns.jei.info.ancient_brass: Can be used in place of Brass, or used to tame Supply Scamps
scguns.jei.info.scamp_controller: Used to link a Supply Scamp to a container, or to change the behavior of a Supply Scamp, via shift right clicking
scguns.jei.info.enemy_log: Used to whitelist mobs a turret will fire at. Right click a mob to have the turrets fire at just that mob, Shift right click to whitelist that whole mob type.
scguns.jei.info.team_log: Used to blacklist mobs a turret will fire at. Right click a mob to have the turrets ignore just that mob, Shift right click to blacklist that whole mob type.
scguns.jei.info.niter_dust: Can be obtained from Geothermal vents, or composting in a Advanced Composter. Used in Gunpowder production, or as a weak fertilizer
scguns.jei.info.advanced_composter: Accepts compostable items to produce bone meal, phosphor dust and niter dust
scguns.jei.info.blasphemy: Can be obtained from using an Empty Blasphemy on a Blaze spawner.
message.sulfur_vent.too_many_active: The Fires of Hell are quenched... No more gas will be released in this area..
scguns.advancement.craft_gun_bench.desc: Crafted a Gun Bench, used for creating guns.
scguns.advancement.craft_macerator.desc: Crafted a Macerator, used for crafting various gunpowder's and alloys
scguns.advancement.craft_powered_macerat: Crafted a Powered Macerator, now powered by energy
scguns.advancement.craft_powered_stampin: Crafted a Powered Stamping Press, now powered by energy
Crafted a Stamping Press, used for crafting gun parts and pressing rounds
scguns.advancement.craft_blank_mold.desc: Crafted a Blank Mold, used for crafting various molds
scguns.advancement.craft_small_casing_mo: Used for crafting small Copper, Iron, Brass and Diamond Steel casings
scguns.advancement.craft_medium_casing_m: Used for crafting medium Copper,Brass and Diamond Steel casings and Empty Cells
scguns.advancement.craft_large_casing_mo: Used for crafting large Iron and Brass casings
scguns.advancement.craft_bullet_mold.des: Used for crafting Standard and Hardened Bullet tips
scguns.advancement.flint.desc: Obtained Flint, used for Blackpowder weapons
scguns.advancement.iron.desc: Obtained Iron, used in the crafting of majority of Firearms
scguns.advancement.copper.desc: Obtained Copper, used in the crafting of Copper Firearms
scguns.advancement.craft_lightning_batte: Crafted a Lightning Battery! Can absorb energy from lightning, and craft special components
scguns.advancement.craft_lightning_rod_c: Used for to transfer a lightning strike from a Lightning Rod
scguns.advancement.geothermal_vent.desc: Obtain a Geothermal Vent from the ocean depths
Used for farming Niter from a Geothermal Vent, or Sulfur from a Sulfur Vent
scguns.advancement.craft_polar_generator: Crafted a Polar Generator, used for generating power
scguns.advancement.treated_brass_bluepri: Unearthed the secrets of Dr Osgood, used for crafting Treated Brass Firearms
scguns.advancement.diamond_steel_bluepri: Discovered the Asgharian Methods, used for crafting Diamond Steel Firearms
scguns.advancement.piglin_blueprint.desc: Found deep in the bastions, used for crafting Piglish Firearms
scguns.advancement.ocean_blueprint.desc: Found in ancient treasure, used for crafting Oceanic Firearms
scguns.advancement.deep_dark_blueprint.d: Found in the depths of an Ancient City used for crafting Deep Dark Firearms
scguns.advancement.end_blueprint.desc: Found in the End Cities, used for crafting End Firearms
scguns.advancement.scorched_blueprint.de: Created by combining all the blueprints, used for crafting Scorched Firearms
scguns.advancement.anthralite.desc: Obtained Anthralite, used in the crafting of majority of Firearms
scguns.advancement.niter_dust.desc: Obtained Niter, used in gunpowder production, and other ~cool~ things
scguns.advancement.ancient_brass.desc: Obtained Ancient Brass, used to create Brass casings, and Treated Brass
scguns.advancement.sulfur_chunk.desc: Obtained Sulfur, used in gunpowder production
scguns.advancement.treated_brass.desc: Obtained Treated Brass, used in production of Treated Brass Firearms
scguns.advancement.diamond_steel.desc: Obtained Diamond Steel, used in production of Diamond Steel Firearms
scguns.advancement.scorched_ingot.desc: Obtained a Scorched Ingot, used in production of Scorched Firearms
scguns.advancement.gunpowder.desc: Obtained gunpowder! A basic component in ammunition
scguns.advancement.peal.desc: Obtained Peal! A Gunpowder and Sculk blend, used in advanced ammunition
scguns.advancement.sheol.desc: Obtained Sheol! A Nether Gunpowder Blend, used in advanced ammunition
scguns.advancement.nitro_powder.desc: Obtained Nitro Powder! The ultimate Gunpowder, used in only the heaviest of ammunition
scguns.advancement.vehement_coal.desc: Obtained Vehement Coal, An intensely hot fuel source
scguns.advancement.thermolith.desc: Crafted a Thermolith, Powered by vehement coal, can melt rock down to lava
scguns.advancement.cryoniter.desc: Crafted a Cryoniter, Powered by Niter Dust or Ice, can freeze water into ice
scguns.advancement.flintlock_pistol.desc: A spark of history in your hand.
scguns.advancement.handcannon.desc: Unleash Devastation, directly in front of you
scguns.advancement.saketini.desc: A drink for men of culture
scguns.advancement.krauser.desc: You and I both know where we come from
scguns.advancement.inertial.desc: Sweet dreams are made of this
scguns.advancement.mas_55.desc: Weight of the world in your hands.

scguns.advancement.earths_corpse.desc: It shouldn't have happened like this
scguns.advancement.flayed_god.desc: Never has pain been felt like this
scguns.advancement.newborn_cyst.desc: The rotten birth of a new era
scguns.desc.unknown: Knowledge of this weapon is not yet discovered
